children.text: Spruce Saddle Lodge is a quick service restaurant offering American Grill style meals. Salad bar and prime rib sandwhich are featured items.

The Osprey Fireside Grill is an elevated Colorado ski lounge experience serving comfort food, artisan sandwiches, wraps and craft cocktails. The menu features house-smoked wings and protein-powered bowls along with daily lunch and apres-ski specials.
Broken Arrow is a full service dining experience offering American style grilled items. Featured items include Burgers, hotdogs, fries and an array of hearty soups.

Zach's Cabin is a full service signature dining experience offering a contemporary style of cooking with an alsatian regional focus. Featured items include Beer braised bison short rib, duck leg confit, seared artic char and foie gras tart.
The Ice Cream Parlour is a quick service, grab and go restaurant. Featured items include novelty ice cream, banana splits, rootbeer floats, soups and sandwhich lunches
Talon's is a quick service restaurant offering American Grill style meals. Features items include artisan deli sandwhiches, salads, burgers, chicken strips and freshly made soups.
Mamie's Landing is a quick service restaurant offering hot lunch grab and go items. Featured items include soups, chili, sandwhiches and burgers.
Cookie Cabin is a quick service location offering fresh-baked chocolate chip cookies for Ski and snowboard school guests.
Citrea is a full service restaurant offering an array of modern mediterranean cuisine. Featured items include handmade pastas, pizzas, grilled tenderloin and pan seared halibut.
Candy Cabin is a quick service location offering sugary treats including sour candies, assorted chocolates and classic pepsi products.
Beano's Cabin is a signature dining restaurant featuring a gourmet 5 course dinner experience.

Allie's Cabin is a white tablecloth service restaurant offering a rustic take on Northern Italian Steakhouse cuisine. Featured items include Braised Short Rib Ravioli, Striped Bass and Grilled New York Strip.
